document.full_text: palestinian president mahmoud abbas said on thursday it would "illogical" for the united states to block a palestinian bid for statehood planned at the united nations in september.
document.title: abbas sees u.s. support for palestinian statehood bid
lines_and_colors: palestinian president mahmoud abbas said on thursday it would "illogical" for the united states to block a palestinian bid for statehood planned at the united nations in september.
